scripts.test:mt:rna-tw: pnpm exec turbo run test test:unit --filter=./packages/main-template/react/next/app/tailwind
scripts.test:mt:rna-ve: pnpm exec turbo run test test:unit --filter=./packages/main-template/react/next/app/vanilla-extract
scripts.test:mt:rnp-tw: pnpm exec turbo run test test:unit --filter=./packages/main-template/react/next/pages/tailwind
scripts.test:mt:rnp-ve: pnpm exec turbo run test test:unit --filter=./packages/main-template/react/next/pages/vanilla-extract
scripts.test:mt:rrr-ve: pnpm exec turbo run test test:unit --filter=./packages/main-template/react/react-router/vanilla-extract
scripts.test:mt:rts-tw: pnpm exec turbo run test test:unit --filter=./packages/main-template/react/tanstack-router/tailwind
scripts.test:mt:rts-ve: pnpm exec turbo run test test:unit --filter=./packages/main-template/react/tanstack-router/vanilla-extract
scripts.test:mt:vn-ve: pnpm exec turbo run test test:unit --filter=./packages/main-template/vue/nuxt/vanilla-extract
scripts.test:mt:vvr-ve: pnpm exec turbo run test test:unit --filter=./packages/main-template/vue/vue-router/vanilla-extract
scripts.build:upgrade-mac: pnpm exec ncc build ./scripts/upgrade/change-upgrade-version-mac.ts -o ./dist/upgrade-mac && pnpm exec tsx scripts/write/upgrade-write-mac.ts
scripts.build:upgrade-win: pnpm exec ncc build ./scripts/upgrade/change-upgrade-version-win.ts -o ./dist/upgrade-win && pnpm exec tsx scripts/write/upgrade-write-win.ts
scripts.build:tmp: pnpm exec ncc build ./packages/create-template/src/index.ts -o ./dist/react-tmp && pnpm exec tsx scripts/write/tmp-write.ts
scripts.test:react-dev: pnpm -C test/react/test-dev exec uv venv && pnpm -C test/react/test-dev exec uv pip install -r requirements.txt && pnpm -C test/react/test-dev exec uv run main.py
scripts.test:react-pack: pnpm build:tmp && pnpm cp:cli-mac && pnpm cp:cli-win && pnpm -C test/react/test-pack exec uv venv && pnpm -C test/react/test-pack exec uv pip install -r requirements.txt && pnpm -C test/react/test-pack exec uv run main.py
scripts.test:vue-dev: pnpm -C test/vue/test-dev exec uv venv && pnpm -C test/vue/test-dev exec uv pip install -r requirements.txt && pnpm -C test/vue/test-dev exec uv run main.py
scripts.test:vue-pack: pnpm build:tmp && pnpm cp:cli-mac && pnpm cp:cli-win && pnpm -C test/vue/test-pack exec uv venv && pnpm -C test/vue/test-pack exec uv pip install -r requirements.txt && pnpm -C test/vue/test-pack exec uv run main.py
